pages.text: As you might expect, this pack is about a pseudo-hardmode recipe challenge. In this sense, Vanilla-like tools are completely disabled. Your choice is to start with Tinkers Construct (which you can do only using Wood), or Tetra. To get started with Tinkers, make yourself the book 'Materials and You' to learn how to get started.

To get started with Tetra, use wood to create wooden tools like you might normally expect. You'll notice that these aren't just any normal wooden tools, but all-wood Tetra tools. You'll want to craft a Wooden Hammer to get yourself a Holosphere.
